content:
Hi I have a field for Patient Education.
Eg : B.tech, MA, Mtech

I am not able to find the mapping for this in FHIR.
Inside Patient there is no such field.

Please help me mapping this field in FHIR

for a degree which it looks like you are asking check out the HumanName datatype. Specifically the .suffix element.
For more detailed education details, I would look at Observation
